item.title: Solving a simple puzzle using SymPy
item.description: I came across this problem recently: image:/posts/p9-problem.png It’s about a square that gets partitioned into rectangles of equal area (a term for this might be https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Floorplan_(microelectronics) floorplan)). One of the sides of these smaller rectangles is given and the problem asks for the area of the large square. It’s possible to build equations for: the smaller rectangle sides that add up to the same length of the large square
